edu.stanford.math.plex

Class Torus

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.math.plex.PointData
      • edu.stanford.math.plex.PointData.NSpace
        • edu.stanford.math.plex.Torus

  • public class Torus
extends PointData.NSpace
    A Torus instance is discrete simulation of a d-dimensional torus. For testing.

    Simplest implementation of a d-dimensional torus. Intended for testing.

    Version:
    $Id$
